DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine influence supplementation probiotic Lactobacillus Plantarum 299V vs. placebo probiotic antidepressant monotherapy SSRI ( Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor ) patient major depression .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lactobacillus Plantarum 299v Supplementation Major Depression Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: For period 8 week patient receive probiotic Lactobacillus Plantarum 299V placebo supplementation regular depression treatment SSRI ( Escitalopram Sertraline ) . Psychometric biochemical parameter monitor evaluate . At day one , 3 week ( day 21 ) 8 week ( day 56 ) study psychometric parameter measure Hamilton Depression Rating Scale , PSS-10 Scale , SCL-90 scale . At day one 8 week ( day 56 ) study cognitive function measure use : CVLT- California Verbal Learning Test , RFFT Ruff Figural Fluency Test , Stroop Test , Connecting Points Test ( A B ) , Attention Perceptivity Test . At day one 8 week ( day 56 ) study biochemical parameter measure : morning cortisol , pro anti-inflammatory cytokine , tryptophan kynurenic pathway metabolite concentration .
DOC.criteria: Unipolar depression , least one depressive episode , present episode since least 2 week , Hamilton Depression Scale score 18 high BMI =18,9 29,9 kg/m2 Inflammatory disease eg . rheumatoid disease , inflammatory bowel disease , autoimmunological disease Metabolic diseases e.g . diabetes type I , II , obesity ( Body Mass Index ) > 30 kg/m2 Previously diagnose psychiatric disease depression , psychoactive substance abuse , organic brain dysfunction Smokers Patients surgery last 3 month Oncological patient Patients pregnancy lactation Drugs might influence measure parameter ( e.g . lithium , antibiotic , glucocorticosteroids , antipsychotic drug ) Changes routine blood biochemical parameter : morphology , electrolytes , Aspartate Aminotransferase ( AST ) , Alanine Aminotransferase ( ALT ) , creatinine , urea , Creactive protein ( CRP ) , thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) .
